output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF presence: Yes, CMF 11240014 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Reference to candidates: - Directly mentions George Simion, who is a presidential candidate - Also mentions Răzvan Daniel BIRO as a parliamentary candidate
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, it's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Addresses the entire Sărmașu community and Mureș county
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral messaging - Promotes AUR's vision and candidates - Makes campaign promises about development and revitalization - Uses electoral slogans and campaign rhetoric
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly campaign material, not journalism - Makes political promises and promotes party agenda - Uses campaign-specific formatting and messaging
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an official campaign communication - Contains party slogans and structured campaign messages

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Makes campaign promises - Promotes both parliamentary and presidential candidates - Uses official party messaging and branding - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Contains direct electoral messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: AUR Mureș și Răzvan Daniel BIRO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea candidatului prezidențial George Simion într-o postare sponsorizată pe Facebook (ID: 916525717157198) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală prezidențială. Postarea, activă după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, conține mesaje electorale explicite și promovează imaginea candidatului prezidențial într-un mod care încalcă prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale. Materialul include CMF 11240014, confirmând natura sa de propagandă electorală, și a fost distribuit către un public estimat între 100,001 și 500,000 de persoane.
